meta.description: The pam_krb5 module allows PAM-aware applications to authenticate users by performing an AS exchange with a Kerberos KDC. It can optionally convert Kerberos 5 credentials to Kerberos IV credentials and/or use them to set up AFS tokens for a user's session.
meta.name: pam_krb5

meta.description: PAM module allowing PAM-aware applications to authenticate users by performing an AS exchange with a Kerberos KDC
meta.long_description:
pam_krb5 can optionally convert Kerberos 5 credentials to Kerberos IV
credentials and/or use them to set up AFS tokens for a user's session.
